name: TWF - The Mortal Instruments Edition
description:
The Mortal Instruments Trivia

Exclusive Artwork - Achieve certain milestones to unlock 5 ORIGINAL pieces of artwork of 5 of the main characters done by the very talented Jillian Lim, EXCLUSIVE to this app ONLY. Who's your favourite? After unlocked, have him/her as your wallpaper.

All trademarks and copyrights are owned by their respective owners. This app is not endorsed by or affiliated with the Mortal Instruments, Cassandra Clare, Sony Pictures or their affiliated entities. It is used only for the purpose of review, criticism and entertainment. No copyright violations are intended under the fair use clause.
